laws.title: Data Protection Act
laws.description: Regulates the processing of personal data.

sections.title: General Provisions
sections.content: This section covers the general provisions of the Data Protection Act.

sections.title: Rights of Data Subjects
sections.content: This section outlines the rights of individuals regarding their personal data.

laws.title: Consumer Protection Act
laws.description: Protects consumers against unfair trade practices.

sections.title: Definitions
sections.content: This section defines key terms used in the Consumer Protection Act.

sections.title: Consumer Rights
sections.content: This section describes the rights granted to consumers.
